body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to Melody Music School. My name is Nicholas Lee. May I have your name, please?

Hi, Nicholas. My name is Nicole Carter.

Thank you, Nicole. How can I assist you today?

I was looking at the prices for the guitar lessons, and I'm feeling a bit disappointed by how high they are.

I'm sorry to hear that, Nicole. We do offer competitive rates and various packages. Could I ask for your email address to send you details about any special offers?

Sure, it's nicole.carter123@example.com.

Thank you, Nicole. Also, to ensure I provide you with the best options, could I have your phone number as well?

Yes, it's five five five, zero one two, three four five six.

Thank you for the information, Nicole. I'll make sure you receive the details about our offers shortly. Is there anything else I can help you with?

No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help, Nicholas.

You're welcome, Nicole. Thank you for your time, and have a great day!
